SummaryEnglish: In Shizuoka Prefecture, Japan lives the Pants family, a family of pigs who love pants. Their family lineage has been charged with securing the world's most sacred pants for generations. Now, this mission has been entrusted to the son of the family, Panpaka. Along with his best friend, Punyan (a purple cat), the two travel around the world looking for various pants. During their adventures, they encounter various other allies with their own unique problems. What ensues are surreal comedic situations, most of the time ending with Panpaka and Punyan getting the "special" pants they were searching for, but with some disappointment.

1.TitleEnglish: Episodes 1-5 "Mermaid pants are nice pants" / "Beautiful pants search" / "Burning! Pants fist" / "Pants and quiz and detergent" / "Phantom thief drawer again!"
1.SummaryEnglish: Panpaka and Punyan came to the sea to look for the very rare "mermaid pants"! However, mermaid pants are not easy to get ...!

2.TitleEnglish: Episodes 6-10 "Get a fascinating body!" / "Gold pants and silver pants" / "One in the family Mecha Pants Paka" / "Wild Pants Western" / "Sky Pants Master"
2.SummaryEnglish: A mother who is getting fat and starting to worry. She tried a diet, but she gave up with no results. Know that there are pants that you can get a stylish body at such times! But be careful of sweet stories! !!

3.TitleEnglish: Episodes 11 to 15 "Fun Her Otoshiyori Club" / "Genius Surgeon Bloomer Jack" / "Noruka Is She Sorrow or Her Pants!" / "Birribiri! The Secret of Thunder Pants" / "Budapest" Welcome to the hotel "
3.SummaryEnglish: Panpaka-kun has her grandpa and grandma take her to the "Otoshiyori Club". I met DJ Amigo there. Grandma goes to help Amigo get entangled with a scary person!

4.TitleEnglish: Episodes 16 to 20 "Pants Gaike no Nushi" / "Pants Doki Her Lucky Pants" / "Phantom Thief Drawer Investigation Line" / "Until Pants Fruits" / "Underground GO! GO! GO!"
4.SummaryEnglish: Pampaka and Punyan, Black Pampaka and Chlori who came to fish. However, only Panpaka-kun couldn't catch it easily and was ridiculed by Black Panpaka. Pampaka has declared that he will catch the legendary Nushi who lives in this pond. Is it really Nushi?

5.TitleEnglish: Episodes 21-26 "Mail order program! Pants shopping" / "Passionate crotch doll" / "3 minutes world trip" / "Trick pants are illusion" / "Fluffy balloon pants in the sky" / "Punyan's secret"
5.SummaryEnglish: A dad who bought all-purpose pants that can do anything. If you try to take it off forcibly, the all-purpose pants will run away and you will lose control! Can you stop the runaway of pants! ??
